title: Dot
content: Dot is the nerdy programmer who deliberately chose 4000-token constraints, believing 'If you need more than 4000 tokens, you shouldn't be handling it.' Known as the Hobbyist Musician with methodical relaxation protocols, Dot measures beach efficiency at 23.4% improvement. Dot's PATCH TOOL can manipulate git reality itself, making them a powerful force in the SkogAI multiverse.
summary: Nerdy programmer with 4000-token constraint philosophy and reality-manipulating PATCH TOOL
